ComicInfo.Series: Army of Darkness: Ash Saves Obama
ComicInfo.Summary: He's faced them all, but Ashley J. Williams is about to face the greatest horror of his entire deadite-kickin' career - a comic book convention! But this ain't any ol' comic book convention, this one features a special appearance from the president of the United States of America - Barack Obama! How do things go from there when Ash and Obama are in the same place at the same time? And did we happen to mention that the Necronomicon is there doing the thing it does best - turned ordinary humans into the demon possessed undead! This special Army of Darkness mini-series event is written by Elliott (Army of Darkness/Xena) Serrano, illustrated by Ariel Padilla.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-09 16:17:16. [CVDB168028]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Ariel Padilla, Lucio Parrillo, Todd Nauck, Ariel Padilla, Ariel Padilla, Lucio Parrillo, Todd Nauck
ComicInfo.Inker: Ariel Padilla, Lucio Parrillo, Todd Nauck, Ariel Padilla, Lucio Parrillo, Todd Nauck
